actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Social Security.

official_title: A bill to amend section 62 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to make the treatment of business expenses of ministers under such section consistent with the treatment of such expenses for purposes of social security taxes.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that, for purposes of the business expense deduction, a clergyman shall not be treated as an employee.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 62 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to make the treatment of business expenses of ministers under such section consistent with the treatment of such expenses for purposes of social security taxes.
